00032 size_t RangeStat::encoded_length() const {
00033   return 64 + table_identifier.encoded_length() + range_spec.encoded_length();
00034 }
00035 
00036 void RangeStat::encode(uint8_t **bufp) const {
00037   table_identifier.encode(bufp);
00038   range_spec.encode(bufp);
00039   encode_i64(bufp, added_inserts);
00040   encode_i64(bufp, added_deletes[0]);
00041   encode_i64(bufp, added_deletes[1]);
00042   encode_i64(bufp, added_deletes[2]);
00043   encode_i64(bufp, cached_cells);
00044   encode_i64(bufp, collided_cells);
00045   encode_i64(bufp, disk_usage);
00046   encode_i64(bufp, memory_usage);
00047 }
00048 
00049 void RangeStat::decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00050   TableIdentifier tid(bufp, remainp);
00051   table_identifier = tid;
00052 
00053   RangeSpec spec(bufp, remainp);
00054   range_spec = spec;
00055 
00056   HT_TRY("decoding range statistics",
00057     added_inserts = decode_i64(bufp, remainp);
00058     added_deletes[0] = decode_i64(bufp, remainp);
00059     added_deletes[1] = decode_i64(bufp, remainp);
00060     added_deletes[2] = decode_i64(bufp, remainp);
00061     cached_cells = decode_i64(bufp, remainp);
00062     collided_cells = decode_i64(bufp, remainp);
00063     disk_usage = decode_i64(bufp, remainp);
00064     memory_usage = decode_i64(bufp, remainp));
00065 }

00067 size_t RangeServerStat::encoded_length() const {
00068   size_t length = 28;
00069 
00070   for (size_t i = 0; i < range_stats.size(); ++i) {
00071     length += range_stats[i].encoded_length();
00072   }
00073 
00074   return length;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void RangeServerStat::encode(uint8_t **bufp) const {
00078   encode_i32(bufp, range_stats.size());
00079 
00080   for (size_t i = 0; i < range_stats.size(); ++i) {
00081     range_stats[i].encode(bufp);
00082   }
00083 }
00084 
00085 void RangeServerStat::decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00086   size_t n;
00087 
00088   HT_TRY("decoding range statistics",
00089     n = decode_i32(bufp, remainp));
00090 
00091   for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00092     range_stats.push_back(RangeStat(bufp, remainp));
00093   }
00094 }

00096 ostream &Hypertable::operator<<(ostream &os, const RangeStat &stat) {
00097   os << " {" << endl
00098      << "  table =" << stat.table_identifier << endl
00099      << "  range_spec =" << stat.range_spec << endl
00100      << "  disk_usage = " << stat.disk_usage
00101      << "  memory_usage = "<< stat.memory_usage << endl
00102      << "  added_inserts = " << stat.added_inserts
00103      << "  cached_cells = " << stat.cached_cells
00104      << "  collided_cells = " << stat.collided_cells << endl
00105      << "  added_row_deletes = " << stat.added_deletes[0]
00106      << "  added_cf_deletes = " << stat.added_deletes[1]
00107      << "  added_cell_deletes = " << stat.added_deletes[2] << endl
00108      << " }";
00109   return os;
00110 }
